definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אָמָּן]] (ommān) n.m. master-workman, artist Ct So 7:2 (Mish. Talm. [[אוּמָן]], [[אוּמָנוּת]] handiwork, Syr. 0ymon SyrVer Ex 28:11, where = Heb. [[חָרָשׁ]] & is likewise used of gems; Nab. [[אמנא]] Vog:94, As. mar ummâni,Lyon:Sargontexte 65, cf. Zim:BP 12; cf. II. [[אָמוֹן]]).
